text: 15.20 Ese 3.7, Mat 10.24, Luk 6.40, Jon 13.16 Pen takaw nɨbop apin ak, gos nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agak. Nɨbop anɨb apin, Bɨ wog gɨñeb ak, ne bɨawl ne tek ma yenɨgab apin agak. Ne yokɨp bɨ wog gɨñeb yenɨgab apin agak. Anɨb ak, yɨp gɨ tɨmel gelak, nɨbop abe gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgabal agak. Pen takaw yad ak delak, takaw nɨbi ak abe dɨnɨgabal agak.
